About Me

I’m super enthusiastic about entrepreneurship and using software to add value to the world. Working on an automation platform that helps enterprises create AI automations much more easily than Gumloop, Zapier and UIPath. Working with a few enterprise users.


If you're building something interesting, looking to collaborate, or want to talk about ideas, feel free to reach out!


Here are some of my test scores:
- IIT-JEE: All India Rank 183 among 1.3 million students (99.99 percentile).

 • Indian National Chemistry Olympiad 2019
 • Indian National Astronomy Olympiad 2019
- Kishore Vaigyanik Protsahan Yojana (KVPY exam): All India Rank 109.
- Current Columbia University CGPA: 4.04/4.

Education & Experience

Columbia University in the City of New York

MS CS | Aug 2023 - Dec 2024 | New York, United States

GPA: 4.0825/4.0
Relevant Coursework: Generative AI for Code, Cloud Computing, Engineering Software as a Service, Blockchain and Web3.0, Databases, Computation and the brain, Principles of Innovation, UI Design

Here's some stuff I did :
  • Zerocurve AI: Built a tool that helps people learn to use complicated-UI software.
  • Inntwine: Built a networking and idea sharing platform for Columbia students.
  • Software-as-a-Service Developer: Built a SaaS platform for food makers, using Ruby on Rails, following agile development.
  • Blockchain Developer: Built an Ethereum-based FCFS freelancing platform with automatic job verification and payment.
  • AWS Cloud Application: Built a microservice-based courseworks add-on with calendar integration for Columbia students.
  • Brain Simulator: Developed a simulator to analyze transition dynamics of neuron assemblies in spiking networks.
  • Teaching Assistant (COMS 4444): Created game simulators, supported 30+ students trying to beat it in real time.
  • Teaching Assistant (COMS 4460): Guided 20+ students on how to best launch their tech venture.

Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay

BTech. Electrical Engineering and Computer Science | Jul 2019 - Aug 2023 | Mumbai, India

GPA: 9.21/10.0
Relevant Coursework: Technology Venture Creation, Data Structures and Algorithms, Analysis of Algorithms, Programming for Data Science, Introduction to ML, Advanced ML, Intelligent Agents and RL, Deep Learning for NLP, Optimization in ML, Digital Image Processing

Here's some stuff I did :
  • Data partnerships in Indian banks: Worked on a B2B to greatly simplify bank digital partnerships (customer data exchange with third parties).
  • AI Researcher: Focused on counterfactual estimation for continuous treatment datasets. Published at AAAI-24.
  • Neuromorphic Engineering Research: Developed speech recognition using Liquid State Machines (LSM) and explored non-backpropagation training rules to improve performance.
  • GAN Perception: Trained GANs on different input image datasets and used CLIP to gauge their understanding of subjective concepts like 'beautiful'.
  • Institute Student Mentor: Mentored 12 freshmen on academics and extracurriculars.
  • Teaching Assistant (MA207): Conducted tutorials on advanced differential equations for 40+ students.

Experience

Adobe

Machine Learning Researcher - May 2022 - Jul 2022

As a Machine Learning Researcher at Adobe, I was responsible for extensive literature survey in multimodal media and developing a controllable image description generation system.

  • Analyzed over 30 research papers in multimodal media to formulate a research problem.
  • Utilized dense captioning through Faster R-CNNs and BERT transformers for controllable image captioning.
  • Developed and submitted a patent for the first controllable captioning algorithm using a continuous value as input.
  • Presented slide decks and demonstrated the solution to senior executives at Adobe.
  • Created a website to deploy ML models and provided real-time demos.

Resulting Publication: Akshay Iyer et al., "A method to generate image descriptions with varying levels of detail", Adobe Reference: P11617-US

Python Natural Language Processing (NLP) Computer Vision Deep Learning Machine Learning

Samsung Semiconductor

Digital Hardware Intern - May 2021 - Jul 2021

As a Digital Hardware Intern, I implemented data integrity checks for the NVMe interface in Solid State Drives (SSDs).

  • Analyzed the NVMe interface, NVMe IPs, DDR memory, and the axi4 interface.
  • Verified the 8-bit protection information appended to stored data to ensure data integrity in SSDs.
VHDL NVM Express (NVMe)

Cogno AI

Machine Learning Intern - Dec 2020 - Jan 2021

At Cogno AI, I built a customer service chatbot using NLP and deep learning techniques.

  • Processed data using language translation tools and NLP techniques such as lemmatization and stemming.
  • Implemented a bi-directional LSTM neural network to classify queries into predefined sets.
  • Achieved a classification accuracy of over 90% across a multilingual dataset.
Python Natural Language Processing (NLP) Machine Learning
